channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Assembleia da República
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Assembleia da República

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Observador and TVI, 7–18 January 2021 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 59–79 seats
  • Partido Socialista: 111–134 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 4–14 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 0–2 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 5–15 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 0–4 seats
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 4–12 seats
  • Chega: 7–17 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Observador and TVI, 7–18 January 2021 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Observador and TVI, 7–18 January 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 22.3–29.2%

  • Bloco de Esquerda: 3.9–7.5%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 0.9–2.9%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 3.9–7.5%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1.3–3.7%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 3.5–6.9%
  • Chega: 5.1–9.1%
